thread.title: InventHelp Inventor Develops Improved Rod-and-Reel Design (LAN-131)
thread.title_full: InventHelp Inventor Develops Improved Rod-and-Reel Design (LAN-131) - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: InventHelp Inventor Develops Improved Rod-and-Reel Design (LAN-131)
text:
InventHelp, a Pittsburgh-based inventor company, is submitting the REEL MC COY to companies for their consideration.
PITTSBURGH, PA (PRWEB) October 22, 2015
"I did not want to have to lug around a bunch of rods and reels to and from my fishing spot," said an inventor from Harrisburg, Pa. "I know that other fishermen feel the same. This inspired me to develop a more convenient, compact, space-saving solution."
He created a prototype for the REEL MC COY to make it easier to switch between various reels. The unit eliminates the need to carry several rods and reels to and from the fishing spot. It features a space-saving design. The accessory makes fishing less stressful and more enjoyable. Additionally, it does not require the use of tools.
The original design was submitted to the Lancaster office of InventHelp. It is currently available for licensing or sale to manufacturers or marketers. For more information, write Dept. 14-LAN-131, InventHelp, 217 Ninth Street, Pittsburgh, PA 15222, or call (412) 288-1300 ext. 1368. Learn more about InventHelp's Invention Submission Services at http://www.InventHelp.com - https://www.youtube.com/user/inventhelp
